solution_line_template: This month, Lily wants to finish reading {books_last_month} x {multiplier_this_month} = <<{books_last_month}*{multiplier_this_month}={books_this_month}>>{books_this_month} books.
So, for two months, she will finish reading {books_last_month} + {books_this_month} = <<{books_last_month}+{books_this_month}={total_books_two_months}>>{total_books_two_months} books.
